file_summary: This Java class, `VetController`, acts as a Spring MVC controller responsible for handling web requests related to veterinarians within the Spring PetClinic application. It uses `VetRepository` to interact with the data layer. The controller provides two main functionalities: one for rendering an HTML page displaying a paginated list of vets (`/vets.html`), and another for exposing a RESTful endpoint (`/vets`) that returns a JSON representation of all vets. The HTML view includes pagination logic to display a manageable number of vets per page. The REST endpoint simplifies data mapping for client-side consumption. This controller effectively bridges the presentation layer with the business logic for managing veterinarian data.
